TopicTitle: Using fairing creates more drag than not using it

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 64-bit | CPU: Ryzen 5 3600 | GPU: Nvidia RTX 3060Ti | RAM: 2x8GB Corsair Vengeance RGB PRO DDR4 3200MHz


My rocket becomes more stable once I deploy my fairing, leading me to think that the fairing (size S) is creating more drag at the front of the rocket than the satellite within. 

 

Edited July 17, 2023 by Anth12

4 hours ago, Civil Duck said:

My rocket becomes more stable once I deploy my fairing, leading me to think that the fairing (size S) is creating more drag at the front of the rocket than the satellite within. 

Thanks a lot for reporting a bug report.
By size S you mean the SM?
